column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Lou's is one of the better deep dish pizza joints in Chicago. Be sure to go in earlier Incase there is a wait. What I have liked before is that you can put your pizza order in with the host when you arrive (even if your table isn't ready). That way
column2: your pizza can begin cooking once you arrive and be ready sooner so you do not need to wait much longer after you are seated.
